pages.text: $(thing)Barathos$() has two bosses to fight: $(thing)Baroness$(), and $(thing)Hive King$()
pages.title: Bosses

pages.text: This powerful witch fights by creating bombs and firing explosive projectiles. She can be summoned by using a Warlock Gem on a Baroness Altar
The king of the Hive Nests. He commands Hive Workers to assist him in battle, although he's more than capable of taking down opponents by himself
